SEARCH
Package de.tel_ran.shtentsel_java_telegrambot.service

Class BotService

java.lang.Object
de.tel_ran.shtentsel_java_telegrambot.service.BotService
@Service public class BotService extends Object
Service class that handles bot operations such as processing user updates, creating messages, and managing custom keyboards.

    • getUpdateMessage

      public String getUpdateMessage(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Update update)
      Extracts the text message from an incoming update.
      Parameters:
      update - the update received from a Telegram user.
      Returns:
      the message as a string or an empty string if none is found.

    • getUpdateChatId

      Extracts the chat ID from an incoming update.
      Parameters:
      update - the update received from a Telegram user.
      Returns:
      the chat ID or null if none is found.

    • createMessage

      public org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.methods.send.SendMessage createMessage(long chat_id, String text)
      Creates a SendMessage object for sending a text message to a specified chat.
      Parameters:
      chat_id - the ID of the chat to which the message will be sent.
      text - the text of the message to be sent.
      Returns:
      a SendMessage object.

    • checkConditions

      public Command checkConditions(String message, boolean isBaseCurrency, String baseCurrency, boolean isAvailableForSubscription)
      Checks the conditions of a received message and determines the appropriate command.
      Parameters:
      message - the text message from the user.
      isBaseCurrency - a flag indicating if a base currency has been set.
      baseCurrency - the base currency code.
      isAvailableForSubscription - a flag indicating if the user can subscribe.
      Returns:
      the determined Command object.

    • setKeyboard

      public org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.methods.send.SendMessage setKeyboard(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.methods.send.SendMessage message, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.replykeyboard.InlineKeyboardMarkup keyboard)
      Attaches an inline keyboard to a SendMessage object.
      Parameters:
      message - the SendMessage object.
      keyboard - the InlineKeyboardMarkup to be attached.
      Returns:
      the updated SendMessage object with the keyboard.

    • currencyKeyboard

      public org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.replykeyboard.InlineKeyboardMarkup currencyKeyboard()
      Creates an inline keyboard with buttons representing different currency options.
      Returns:
      an InlineKeyboardMarkup object with currency buttons.

      Creates a row of currency buttons.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode1 - the code for the first currency.
      currencyCode2 - the code for the second currency.
      currencyCode3 - the code for the third currency.
      currencyCode4 - the code for the fourth currency.
      Returns:
      a list of InlineKeyboardButton objects.
